scripts.uglify: npm run babel && uglifyjs dist/source.js -c -m -o dist/source.min.js && rm dist/source.js
scripts.jslet: npm run uglify && rm -f dist/javascriptlet.min.js && printf "javascript:(()=>{" >> dist/javascriptlet.min.js && cat dist/source.min.js | tr '\n' ' ' >> dist/javascriptlet.min.js && printf "})();" >> dist/javascriptlet.min.js && rm dist/source.min.js
